title: time: Timezone issue with Atlantic/South_Georgia
body:
by **apalmblad**: 
On go 1.0.3 in OS X 10.8, Atlantic/South_Georgia doesn't seem to be working properly.

See gist (tz database not installed in playground ): 
https://gist.github.com/apalmblad/5470791

I've also unzipped the included tz database, and verified with zdump the
included-with-go file for Atlantic/South_Georgia.
